body_html:
@davidzchen

Are you modifying any files under third_party/gpus between running ./configure and bazel build?

Yes, that makes sense. I'm modifying bazel-tensorflow/external/protobuf/BUILD to fix this issue here and third_party/gpus/crosstool/clang/bin/crosstool_wrapper_driver_is_not_gcc.tpl to fix this issue here. I got it to compile after re-running ./configure and bazel build.
